author: Merry
title: MARKET REPORT: BAE Systems fired up by ongoing global conflicts
text:
British defense giant BAE Systems was one of the biggest risers on the FTSE 100 yesterday as the industry was boosted by geopolitical tensions.
On a quiet day for the London market, BAEâ€™s share price rose 0.6 per cent, or 6.5p, to 1,102p after a report revealed its order book had increased by around Â£ 7 billion in one year.
Rising global hostilities and ongoing conflicts have increased defense spending.
Order books at the worldâ€™s biggest defense companies have reached near record levels and MSCIâ€™s global benchmark for industry shares is up 25 percent in the past 12 months.
The war in Ukraine partly explains the increase, but companies such as BAE Systems have also been boosted by new orders for existing contracts.
Boosted: On a quiet day for the London market, BAEâ€™s share price rose 1.1% after a report revealed its order book had increased by around Â£7bn in a year.
The report revealed that BAEâ€™s order book increased from Â£48.5 billion to Â£55.5 billion in 2022. And orders hit a record Â£66 billion in the first half of this year.
Meanwhile, mining stocks also rose after copper prices rose 1.36 per cent to 8,690.5p yesterday.
Anglo Americanâ€™s share price rose 0.5 per cent, or 9 pence, to 1,984.8 pence, while Antofagasta fell 0.2 per cent, or 3 pence, to 1,707.5 pence.
Glencoreâ€™s share price fell 0.4 per cent, or 1.7 pence, to 470.1 pence. Rio Tinto shares rose 0.6 per cent, or 35 pence, to 5,860 pence.
Other risers included AstraZeneca, which continued to gain thanks to a Â£950m deal to buy Shanghai pharmaceutical company Gracell Biotechnology, which was announced on Boxing Day.
The drugmakerâ€™s share price jumped 0.4 per cent, or 46 pence, to 10,574 pence, and rival pharmaceutical giant GSK also rose 0.8 per cent, or 11.6 pence, to 1,461.2 pence. .
The FTSE 100 index of blue-chip shares fell 0.03 per cent, or 2.2 points, to 7,722.74 pence, while the FTSE 250 mid-cap index fell 0.01 per cent, or 1.6 points, to 19,719.16.
Stock Watch â€“ Zanaga Iron Ore
Zanaga Iron Ore shares rose after the company revealed a deal to boost its project in the Republic of Congo.
The agreement has been signed with China Machinery Engineering Corporation (CMEC).
CMEC will complete inspections at the sites near Zanaga and draft proposals on how the hydroelectric dams will be financed.
Iron ore prices have been gaining strength in recent weeks as confidence grows over the outlook for Chinaâ€™s steel demand.
The shares rose 17.3 per cent, or between 1.5p and 10.3p.
On Wall Street, the Dow Jones rose 0.2 percent, while the S&P 500 also rose 0.2 percent and the Nasdaq gained 0.3 percent.
Meanwhile, the pound was trading at $1.276 against the dollar.
Oil prices fell about 1 percent after falling nearly 2 percent the previous day as major shipping companies began returning to the Red Sea.
Danish company Maersk said it has container ships scheduled to travel through the Suez Canal and the Red Sea.
It had called for a temporary suspension this month following attacks by Yemenâ€™s Iran-backed Houthi militia.
The decision to restore the route has â€œhelped allay some immediate concerns about supply issuesâ€, said Susannah Streeter, head of money and markets at Hargreaves Lansdown.
Shellâ€™s share price fell 0.3 per cent, or 7p, to 2,549p. BP shares fell 0.4 percent, or 2 pence, to 465 pence on lower oil prices.
â€œThe market is likely to try to rally againâ€¦perhaps early in the new year, amid expectations of a recovery in fuel demand thanks to monetary easing in the United States,â€ said Hiroyuki Kikukawa of NS Trading. a Nissan unit. Values.
Shares in UK housebuilders fell on fears the Bank of England will be slow to cut interest rates in 2024.
A cautious approach would keep mortgage costs higher for longer.
Barratt Developmentsâ€™ share price fell 0.7 per cent, or 4p, to 562.4p, Land Securities shares fell 1 per cent, or 7.2p, to 716.4p and Berkeley fell 0.4 per cent, or 20 pence, to 4,737 pence.
Streeter said: â€˜Housebuilders are on the defensive amid signs that consumers are still showing signs of resilience in their spending patterns in the post-Christmas sales.
â€œThe Bank of England is showing more caution than the Federal Reserve about the path of inflation, so any sign that interest rates could stay high for longer in the UK is not good for the housing market.â€
On Londonâ€™s AIM market, chipmaker Sondrel fell the most. The shares plunged 53.7 per cent after a Â£1.7m contract delay caused cash flow problems.
Some links in this article may be affiliate links. If you click on them, we may earn a small commission. That helps us fund This Is Money and keep it free to use. We do not write articles to promote products. We do not allow any commercial relationship to affect our editorial independence.

author: Joshua Wilburn
title: Joe Rogan & Dennis Quaid Claim Hollywood 'Blackballs' Conservatives
text: Joe Rogan and Dennis Quaid Claim Hollywood 'Blackballs' Conservatives [Joe Rogan](https://okmagazine.com/t/joe-biden/) referred to [Hollywood](https://okmagazine.com/t/hollywood/) as a community that "blackballs" conservatives while speaking to actor [Dennis Quaid](https://okmagazine.com/t/dennis-quaid/). On a recent episode of " [The Joe Rogan Experience](https://okmagazine.com/p/joe-rogan-reveals-voting-rfk-jr-over-donald-trump/)," Rogan and Quaid delved into the topic of Hollywood's treatment of conservatives and "cancel culture" as a whole. Quaid, who plays [Ronald Reagan](https://okmagazine.com/t/ronald-reagan/) in the upcoming movie Reagan, revealed people tried to "cancel" him while working on the film. Rogan expressed his frustration with the industry, highlighting how individuals often choose to remain silent about their [political beliefs](https://okmagazine.com/p/donald-trump-mental-state-incoherent-de-banking-speech-new-hampshire/) out of fear of repercussions. He criticized Hollywood for its "lack of diverse opinions," stating that speaking out could result in being "blackballed." Quaid did not shy away from criticizing the "cancel culture media." He also pushed back against the claim that the 2020 Covid PSA he did with [Dr. Anthony Fauci](https://okmagazine.com/p/donald-trump-hurled-f-bombs-dr-anthony-fauci-win-election-landslide/) was an endorsement of [Donald Trump](https://okmagazine.com/t/donald-trump/). Quaid denounced these claims as ["fake news"](https://okmagazine.com/p/donald-trump-abc-fake-news-reporter-calls-out-racist-remarks/) and expressed his displeasure with being mischaracterized by the media. "It is being used by the cancel culture media that I was doing a campaign ad and endorsement of Donald Trump, and that I was paid handsomely for this by diverted CDC funds," Quaid said. [Joe Rogan Reveals He's Voting for Robert F. Kennedy Jr. Over Donald Trump: 'Only One That Makes Sense to Me'](https://okmagazine.com/p/joe-rogan-reveals-voting-rfk-jr-over-donald-trump/?utm_source=recirculation) [Joe Rogan Would 'Love' to Get Prince Harry Drunk and Confront Him About Taking Mushrooms After Royal Dissed Him for His Shocking COVID-19 Remarks](https://okmagazine.com/p/joe-rogan-love-prince-harry-drunk-confront-him-mushrooms-covid-remarks/?utm_source=recirculation) [Joe Rogan's Bold Prediction: Social Media Star Claims Kamala Harris Will Beat Donald Trump in 2024 Election](https://okmagazine.com/p/joe-rogan-prediction-kamala-harris-beat-donald-trump-2024-election/?utm_source=recirculation) Quaid previously endorsed Trump in an interview with [Piers Morgan](https://okmagazine.com/t/piers-morgan/), referring to him as "my a-

author: Philipp Kuserau
title: Ã„ltester MarathonlÃ¤ufer der Welt stirbt bei Verkehrsunfall - er trug kuriosen Spitznamen
text:
Ã„ltester MarathonlÃ¤ufer der Welt stirbt bei Verkehrsunfall â€“ er trug kuriosen Spitznamen
Fauja Singh eroberte als â€žTurban-Tornadoâ€œ die Laufwelt und vollendete noch mit 100 Jahren einen Marathon. Die Legende wurde jetzt Opfer eines tragischen Unfalls.
Bias â€“ Eine Lauflegende ist fÃ¼r immer verstummt. Der als Ã¤ltester MarathonlÃ¤ufer der Welt geltende Fauja Singh verstarb im Alter von 114 Jahren bei einem tragischen Verkehrsunfall in seinem indischen Heimatdorf. Ein Leben voller auÃŸergewÃ¶hnlicher Rekorde und inspirierender Geschichten fand ein jÃ¤hes Ende.
Ã„ltester MarathonlÃ¤ufer der Welt stirbt bei Verkehrsunfall â€“ er wurde â€žTorpedo Turbanâ€œ genannt
Der gebÃ¼rtige Inder, der unter dem kuriosen Spitznamen â€žTurban-Tornadoâ€œ internationale BerÃ¼hmtheit erlangte, wurde am Montag beim Ãœberqueren einer StraÃŸe in Bias im Distrikt Jalandhar von einem nicht identifizierten Fahrzeug erfasst. Nach Angaben indischer Medien erlitt Singh eine schwere Kopfverletzung und erlag am Montagabend seinen Verletzungen im Krankenhaus.
Fauja Singh wurde nach Angaben seiner Familie am 1. April 1911 im indischen Bundesstaat Punjab geboren â€“ ein offizieller Nachweis seiner Geburt existierte jedoch nicht. Diese fehlende Dokumentation fÃ¼hrte spÃ¤ter dazu, dass seine beeindruckenden Laufleistungen nicht ins Guinnessbuch der Rekorde aufgenommen wurden.
Marathon-Legende Fauja Singh begann Laufkarriere erst mit 89 Jahren
Seine auÃŸergewÃ¶hnliche Laufkarriere begann erst im hohen Alter von 89 Jahren. Nach dem Tod seiner Ehefrau und eines Sohnes Ã¼bersiedelte Singh im Alter von 84 Jahren nach England. Dort inspirierten ihn MarathonlÃ¤ufe im Fernsehen dazu, selbst mit dem Laufen zu beginnen. Was als BewÃ¤ltigung persÃ¶nlicher Trauer begann, entwickelte sich zu einer der bemerkenswertesten Sportkarrieren der Geschichte.
Mit seinem charakteristischen langen weiÃŸen Bart und dem markanten Turban war Singh bei internationalen WettkÃ¤mpfen stets ein Blickfang. Seinen Spitznamen â€žTurban-Tornadoâ€œ verdankte er seiner beeindruckenden Geschwindigkeit trotz seines hohen Alters.
â€žTurban-Tornadoâ€œ wird zur internationalen Lauflegende
Den HÃ¶hepunkt seiner Karriere erreichte Singh 2011, als er im Alter von 100 Jahren in Toronto einen kompletten Marathon absolvierte. Die 42,195 Kilometer bewÃ¤ltigte er in acht Stunden und elf Minuten â€“ eine Leistung, die ihn zum Ã¤ltesten Menschen machte, der jemals diese Distanz gelaufen war.
Singh wurde zu einer internationalen Ikone des Sports. 2004 trug er das Olympische Feuer in Athen und wiederholte diese Ehre 2012 bei den Olympischen Spielen in London. Er drehte Werbespots mit Weltstars wie David Beckham und Muhammad Ali und wurde zu einem Symbol fÃ¼r Ausdauer und Lebensfreude im hohen Alter.
Seinen letzten offiziellen Wettkampf bestritt Singh 2013 in Hongkong im Alter von 101 Jahren. Ãœber zehn Kilometer erreichte er das Ziel in einer Zeit von einer Stunde, 32 Minuten und 28 Sekunden.
Ã„ltester MarathonlÃ¤ufer der Welt stirbt bei Verkehrsunfall â€“ Trauer um eine Sportlegende
â€žMein Turban-Tornado ist nicht mehrâ€œ, schrieb sein Biograf Khushwant Singh auf der Plattform X und teilte mit groÃŸer Trauer den Tod seines engen Freundes mit. â€žEr wurde von einem nicht identifizierten Fahrzeug erfasst, als er die StraÃŸe Ã¼berquerte. Ruhe in Frieden, mein lieber Fauja.â€œ
Auch Indiens Premierminister Narendra Modi wÃ¼rdigte den Verstorbenen in den sozialen Netzwerken. â€žEr war ein auÃŸergewÃ¶hnlicher Athlet mit unglaublicher Entschlossenheitâ€œ, schrieb Modi und lobte die â€žeinzigartige PersÃ¶nlichkeitâ€œ von Singh und die Art und Weise, â€žwie er die Jugend Indiens fÃ¼r ein sehr wichtiges Thema der Fitness begeisterteâ€œ. (kus)

author: chilango - Chio SÃ¡nchez
title: chilango - CDMX suda la gota gorda: prevÃ©n temperaturas de hasta 33 grados; activan alertas
text: CDMX suda la gota gorda: prevÃ©n temperaturas de hasta 33 grados; activan alertas La CDMX estÃ¡ viviendo dÃ­as con mucho calor. Toma precauciones y checa el pronÃ³stico del clima para hoy y el finde. Por: Chio SÃ¡nchez Â¿Tienes plan de salidita para este fin de semana? Es mejor que cheques cÃ³mo seguirÃ¡ el calor en la CDMX y el Edomex, pues se prevÃ© que el Sol estÃ© con todo. Ante este calorÃ³n que derrite a las y los chilangos, las autoridades de la Ciudad de MÃ©xico activaron dos alertas por altas temperaturas para 14 alcaldÃ­as. O sea, tanto la alerta amarilla y la naranja se activaron ante el calor que se prevÃ©, ya que se esperan temperaturas de hasta 33 grados, de acuerdo con la SecretarÃ­a de GestiÃ³n Integral de Riesgos y ProtecciÃ³n Civil (SGIRPC-CDMX). En [Chilango](https://www.chilango.com/) te decimos cuÃ¡l es el pronÃ³stico del clima para este viernes 22 de marzo y hasta el domingo 24 en la CDMX y en el Edomex. [Checa tambiÃ©n: Juez de CDMX falla a favor de Edgar Oceransky: ordena a vÃ­ctima de violencia sexual disculparse con el cantante](https://www.chilango.com/ciudadania/edgar-oceransky-juez-ordena-disculpa-cdmx/) Viernes 22 de marzo: sigue el calor De acuerdo al pronÃ³stico del clima de la SecretarÃ­a de GestiÃ³n Integral de Riesgos y ProtecciÃ³n Civil, para el dÃ­a de hoy en la CDMX se espera un dÃ­a muy caluroso, ademÃ¡s de cielo despejado. Â¿Y la lluvia?, sin sus luces. Â¡Eso no es todo! Porque se activÃ³ la alerta amarilla y la naranja por altas temperaturas que se esperan en 12 alcaldÃ­as de la capirucha. Â¡Feliz viernes!â€” SecretarÃ­a de GestiÃ³n Integral de Riesgos y PC (@SGIRPC_CDMX) Hoy tendremos cielo mayormente despejado sin condiciones para lluvia en la capital del paÃ­s. Recuerda que se activÃ³ Alerta Naranja y Alerta Amarilla por temperaturas altas en la Ciudad de MÃ©xico. Toma tus precauciones. [#LaPrevenciÃ³nEsNuestraFuerza] [pic.twitter.com/2nThpmiLwD] [March 22, 2024] En el Estado de MÃ©xico se pronostica cielo despejado y sin lluvia. Por la tarde, se percibirÃ¡ un ambiente de cÃ¡lido a caluroso, de acuerdo con el Servicio MeteorolÃ³gico Nacional. Se prevÃ© viento del oeste y suroeste de 15 a 30 km/h con rachas de 40 a 60 km/h y posibles tolvaneras en la regiÃ³n. La temperatura mÃ­nima pronosticada para la Ciudad de MÃ©xico serÃ¡ de 15 a 17 Â°C y la mÃ¡xima de 29 a 31 Â°C. Para el Edomex, la temperatura mÃ­nima serÃ¡ de 5 a 7 Â°C y la mÃ¡xima de 25 a 27 Â°C. Alerta amarilla por calor en alcaldÃ­as de CDMX Para este viernes 22 de marzo se activÃ³ la alerta amarilla asÃ­ como la naranja por altas temperaturas en la capital, de acuerdo con la SecretarÃ­a de GestiÃ³n Integral de Riesgos y ProtecciÃ³n Civil. Las autoridades de la CDMX activaron la alerta amarilla para cuatro alcaldÃ­as. A continuaciÃ³n te decimos en quÃ© demarcaciones se sudarÃ¡ la gota gorda: - Ãlvaro ObregÃ³n - La Magdalena Contreras - TlÃ¡huac - Xochimilco En estas demarcaciones se esperan temperaturas altas entre los 28 a 30 Â°C. Alerta naranja por calor en alcaldÃ­as de CDMX AdemÃ¡s, se activÃ³ en la CDMX la alerta naranja en 10 alcaldÃ­as. A continuaciÃ³n te decimos en quÃ© demarcaciones harÃ¡ mÃ¡s calor: - Azcapotzalco - Benito JuÃ¡rez - CoyoacÃ¡n - CuauhtÃ©moc - Gustavo A. Madero - Iztacalco - Iztapalapa - Miguel Hidalgo - Tlalpan - Venustiano Carranza En estas demarcaciones se esperan temperaturas altas entre los 31 a 33 Â°C. SÃ¡bado 23 de marzo: utiliza bloqueador solar Se pronostican vientos con rachas de 40 a 60 km/h y posibles tolvaneras en el Estado de MÃ©xico y en la Ciudad de MÃ©xico. Eso no es todo, si planeas salir este dÃ­a, no se te olvide cubrirte muy bien de los rayos solares, ya que se esperan temperaturas mÃ¡ximas de 30 a 35 Â°C en la CDMX. Domingo 24 de marzo: cÃºbrete del Sol Se esperan vientos con rachas de 40 a 60 km/h en la CDMX y en el Edomex. AdemÃ¡s, se pronostican temperaturas mÃ¡ximas de 35 a 40 Â°C en el Estado de MÃ©xico, mientras que en la CDMX habrÃ¡ una mÃ¡xima de 30 a 35 Â°C; te recomendamos guardar paraguas en tu bolsa o mochila para que te puedas proteger del Sol y, de esta manera, no sudar la gota gorda. Recomendaciones ante el calor - Evitar hacer ejercicio al aire libre y exponerse al sol de las 11 a las 16 horas - Vestir ropa suelta de colores claros - Usar bloqueador solar - Cubrirse con gorra o sombrero - No permanecer mucho tiempo en vehÃ­culos cerrados - Aumentar el consumo de lÃ­quidos - Evitar consumo de alimentos en la vÃ­a pÃºblica - Mantener una adecuada higiene de las manos - En caso de consumir agua del grifo, hervirla antes - Consumir alimentos frescos como frutas y verduras y lavarlas antes de consumir Para saber cÃ³mo sobrevivir a la CDMX, suscrÃ­bete a nuestro newsletter: [ https://www.chilango.com/newsletter/](https://www.chilango.com/newsletter/)

author: AFP
title: Southern California Edison pagarÃ¡ indemnizaciones a vÃ­ctimas por incendios de Los Ãngeles; "no tienen que esperar para empezar a reconstruir su vida", asegura | El Universal
text:
La compaÃ±Ã­a elÃ©ctrica cuyas lÃ­neas de transmisiÃ³n se sospecha desataron uno de los incendios mortales que asolaron Los Ãngeles este aÃ±o dijo el miÃ©rcoles que compensarÃ­a a las vÃ­ctimas, incluso antes de que haya una conclusiÃ³n formal de que fue culpable. La Southern California Edison (SCE), que se enfrenta a mÃºltiples y costosos pleitos por las llamas , dijo que crearÃ­a un fondo para ofrecer indemnizaciones a quienes perdieran sus hogares o tuvieron afectada su salud.
La empresa no ha dado cifras ni plazos precisos sobre la cuantÃ­a del fondo, pero con un mecanismo de este tipo podrÃ­a evitar algunas de las batallas legales que probablemente tendrÃ¡ que enfrentar.
Lee tambiÃ©n Julio CÃ©sar ChÃ¡vez Jr. â€œsigue bajo custodia del ICE en Texasâ€, dice su abogado; se desconoce su estado de salud
Dos enormes incendios en enero mataron a 31 personas y destruyeron mÃ¡s de 16 mil viviendas y edificios en los alrededores de Los Ãngeles .
AÃºn estÃ¡n bajo investigaciÃ³n las causas del fuego que asolÃ³ el acomodado barrio de Pacific Palisades y partes de MalibÃº, asÃ­ como la ciudad de Altadena, un suburbio mÃ¡s modesto situado en las montaÃ±as.
Durante meses se ha seÃ±alado a una lÃ­nea elÃ©ctrica de Southern California Edison (SCE) como la causa del incendio Eaton que consumiÃ³ Altadena.
Varios videos y testimonios sugieren que el equipo produjo chispas que podrÃ­an haber causado las llamas que se propagaron rÃ¡pidamente.
#BREAKING
SoCal Edison says it will launch a compensation program that will "provide direct payments and fast resolutions" to victims of the #Eaton_Fire . #California #US #Wildfire https://t.co/hf18fKepWS pic.twitter.com/LPPq3N2yeq
ðŸ“ŒThe Wildfire Recovery Compensation Programâ€¦
â€” âš¡ï¸ðŸŒŽ World News ðŸŒâš¡ï¸ (@ferozwala) July 24, 2025 Las vÃ­ctimas "no deberÃ­an tener que esperar a las conclusiones finales de la investigaciÃ³n del incendio Eaton para obtener el apoyo financiero que necesitan para comenzar a reconstruir", dijo Pedro Pizarro, presidente y director ejecutivo de Edison International, la empresa matriz de SCE.
"Aunque todavÃ­a se estÃ¡n evaluando los detalles de cÃ³mo comenzÃ³ el incendio Eaton , SCE ofrecerÃ¡ un proceso acelerado para pagar y resolver reclamaciones de manera justa y rÃ¡pida".
"Esto permite a la comunidad centrarse mÃ¡s en la recuperaciÃ³n que en litigios largos y costosos", agregÃ³.
El fondo cubrirÃ¡ a los propietarios e inquilinos cuyas viviendas resultaron daÃ±adas o destruidas, asÃ­ como a los empresarios cuya propiedad resultÃ³ daÃ±ada o cuyo negocio se vio interrumpido, segÃºn un comunicado.
Lee tambiÃ©n Hospitalizan a uno de los hermanos MenÃ©ndez por este grave padecimiento; ya recibe tratamiento mÃ©dico
TambiÃ©n pagarÃ¡ los daÃ±os personales y ofrecerÃ¡ indemnizaciones a los familiares de los fallecidos en el incendio .
El cambio climÃ¡tico en California inducido por el ser humano estÃ¡ aumentando la frecuencia e intensidad de fenÃ³menos extremos, como los incendios forestales .
No obstante, las lÃ­neas elÃ©ctricas de la SCE han sido seÃ±aladas con frecuencia como la fuente de igniciÃ³n de grandes incendios.

author: RedaÃ§Ã£o Maisfutebol
title: NBA: lesÃ£o termina Ã©poca para Wembanyama dos San Antonio Spurs
text:
Equipa do Texas confirmou uma trombose no ombro direito do poste francÃªs
Terminou a temporada para Victor Wembanyama.
Depois da presenÃ§a no jogo All Star da NBA, com 11 pontos, trÃªs ressaltos e um desarme de lanÃ§amento, os San Antonio Spurs confirmaram uma lesÃ£o do poste francÃªs.
Numa breve nota nas redes sociais, os Spurs referem que Wembanyama foi Â«diagnosticado com uma trombose no seu ombro direitoÂ» e que o jogador de 2,21m vai mesmo falhar o resto da Ã©poca regular.
Esta temporada, o francÃªs de 21 anos conta com mÃ©dias de 24.3 pontos, 11 ressaltos e ainda 3.8 desarmes de lanÃ§amento em 46
O poste foi nomeado pela primeira vez para o jogo All Star isto depois de jÃ¡ ter sido nomeado Rookie de 2024.
Leia aqui o comunicado na Ã­ntegra dos San Antonio Spurs:

Esta condiÃ§Ã£o foi descoberta quando Wembanyama regressou do jogo All-Star em SÃ£o Francisco. Ã‰ espectÃ¡vel que Wembanyama vÃ¡ falhar o que resta da temporada regular de 2024/25. A equipa vai dar mais atualizaÃ§Ãµes quando assim for necessÃ¡rio.Â»

author: InÃ©s MartÃ­n Rodrigo
title: MÃ©s intelÂ·ligÃ¨ncia i menys artifici
text: MÃ©s intelÂ·ligÃ¨ncia i menys artifici No voldria jo arribar a ser diagnosticada, del que fora, per ningÃº que no sigui un metge de carn i os, ni llegir res que no hagi estat escrit per una persona que dubte, desprÃ©s existeix No sÃ© com sâ€™utilitza lâ€™aplicaciÃ³ ChatGPT. Fins fa ben poc ni tan sols sabia com sâ€™escrivia, mâ€™embolicava amb lâ€™ordre de les lletres finals i acabava, sempre que volia escriure-la o pronunciar-la, buscant la paraula a Google, que Ã©s la versiÃ³ perversa de la memÃ²ria colÂ·lectiva. SÃ­ que estic al corrent dâ€™en quÃ¨ consisteix sense necessitat de recÃ³rrer al cercador que tot ho sap: Ã©s una tecnologia que, utilitzant la intelÂ·ligÃ¨ncia artificial, permet mantenir converses mitjanÃ§ant preguntes traslladades per lâ€™home a la mÃ quina, sent aquesta capaÃ§ dâ€™elaborar textos, intelÂ·ligents o intranscendents, partint de la informaciÃ³ proporcionada pel subjecte humÃ  sense ser aquest de vegades conscient dâ€™aquesta transacciÃ³ ni de les seves conseqÃ¼Ã¨ncies. TambÃ© em vaig assabentar, perquÃ¨ la notÃ­cia va sortir en tots els mitjans i, tot i que amb freqÃ¼Ã¨ncia em passa com a Sharon Olds i he de distanciar-me de la realitat per poder suportar-la, llegeixo la premsa i veig i escolto els informatius, de la rocambolesca histÃ²ria de Sam Altman. El cervell darrere de ChatGPT va ser acomiadat per la seva prÃ²pia empresa, OpenAI, desprÃ©s que la junta directiva lâ€™acusÃ©s de no ser "consistentment sincer en les seves comunicacions". Altman va estar poc temps desocupat: Microsoft el va contractar tan bon punt va sortir per la porta, tot i que al cap de pocs dies va tornar al seu antic lloc desprÃ©s que la gran majoria dâ€™empleats dâ€™OpenIA amenacÃ©s de dimitir si no seâ€™l readmetia. Uns mesos abans dâ€™aquest culebrÃ³ mÃ©s propi de la T.I.A. dâ€™IbÃ¡Ã±ez (com seâ€™l troba a faltar, a ell i a tots els genis en plantofes) que de Silicon Valley, un dels pares de la intelÂ·ligÃ¨ncia artificial (nâ€™hi ha molts, Ã©s una paternitat mÃºltiple i molt disputada que es remunta a Alan Turing), Geoffrey Hinton, va deixar la seva feina a Google per poder advertir, sense perjudicar lâ€™empresa de Sundar Pichai, dels riscos de la tecnologia que ell mateix va contribuir a desenvolupar. "Hi havia gent que creia que les mÃ quines podrien tornar-se mÃ©s intelÂ·ligents que les persones, perÃ² la majoria pensava que aixÃ² era molt lluny. Jo mateix pensava que faltaven de 30 a 50 anys, o fins i tot mÃ©s. Ã’bviament, ja no ho penso", va dir Hinton en lâ€™entrevista per a The New York Times en quÃ¨ va anunciar la seva decisiÃ³.NotÃ­cies relacionades No estic jo en condicions de valorar la seva actuaciÃ³ ni de posar-me a analitzar els motius de les anades i vingudes laborals dâ€™Altman. Em falta informaciÃ³, ho desconec gairebÃ© tot dâ€™un camp, el de la intelÂ·ligÃ¨ncia artificial, que, no obstant, fa llarg temps que forma part de la nostra quotidianitat. Van dÃ¨cades, ja, des que vam comenÃ§ar a utilitzar-la, a permetre el seu avenÃ§ cedint dades a travÃ©s de consentiments mai llegits, nomÃ©s acceptats amb tal de no perdre un minut dâ€™aquell valuÃ³s temps que ja no sabem com malgastar. No soc apocalÃ­ptica i tampoc integrada, definicions que el mestre Umberto Eco ens va regalar a mitjans de la dÃ¨cada dels 60 per enfrontar-nos a la cultura de masses. No tirarÃ© per terra la utilitat de molts dels avenÃ§os, en medicina, en informÃ tica, fins i tot en lâ€™Ã mbit domÃ¨stic, en el que seâ€™ns acudi, que ha implicat la intelÂ·ligÃ¨ncia artificial. PerÃ² sÃ­ que soc prudent, i molt observadora. I, per aixÃ², em crida tant lâ€™atenciÃ³ que aquest tema de conversa hagi substituÃ¯t, per exemple, la meteorologia, tan recurrent com innÃ²cua, als recents dinars i sopars nadalencs. EstÃ  clar que Ã©s una revoluciÃ³, perÃ² no tÃ© res a veure amb la industrial. No mâ€™hi oposo. No podria, en soc part implicada. PerÃ² siguem cautelosos. Va ser el que vaig intentar argumentar en una dâ€™aquestes sobretaules, en la qual vaig ser testimoni de lâ€™acceptaciÃ³ de la intelÂ·ligÃ¨ncia artificial com una cosa inevitable i beneficiosa, sense reparar en els seus perills. No voldria arribar a ser diagnosticada, del que fos, per ningÃº que no sigui un metge de carn i ossos, ni llegir res que no hagi sigut escrit per una persona que dubta, per tant existeix. Ã‰s nomÃ©s la punta de lâ€™iceberg, i ja saben el que li va passar al Titanic.

author: PTZOptics
title: Mastering multi-cam video production without a crew: The power of PTZ cameras
text:
For content creators, livestreamers and video professionals, producing high-quality multi-camera video has traditionally required an entire crew. However, with PTZ (pan-tilt-zoom) cameras you can now manage your camera operations and streaming software â€” all without a dedicated team. Now that camera controls are built directly into your favorite video production solutions such as OBS, vmix and Wirecast, itâ€™s easier than ever for solo video creators to do more with less. So, whether youâ€™re streaming a worship service, capturing live sports or recording a corporate presentation, PTZOptics Producer Bundles make it easy to create dynamic, professional video without extra hands.
Why PTZ Cameras Are Perfect for Solo Creators For years, large multi-camera productions typically required one operator per camera. If you didnâ€™t have the budget or crew, you had to settle for a single camera or scramble between multiple tripods. PTZ cameras put an end to that chaos by allowing remote control of pan, tilt and zoom functions. PTZOptics cameras can even track movement automatically, which means you donâ€™t have to make constant manual adjustments. You can program preset anglesâ€” like a wide shot of a stage or a close-up on a speaker â€” and recall those views with one tap. Because PTZ cameras feature NDI, PoE and IP control, they integrate seamlessly into existing networks, reducing cable mess and helping you work more efficiently.
The Power of PTZOptics Producer Bundles Solo creators gravitate toward PTZ cameras because of the simple, all-in-one approach. PTZOptics goes a step farther by offering specialized Producer Bundles that suit various production needs. The Producer SE Bundle (1080p) is great for churches, schools and small studios seeking a solid HD option. It includes a PT-JOY-G4 IP/serial-connected joystick controller and three PTZOptics Move SE cameras that output 1080p video.
If youâ€™re producing higher-end projects, such as professional broadcasts or livestreams, the Producer 4K Bundle includes a SuperJoy joystick controller and three Move 4K cameras. Itâ€™s built for those who want crisp footage.
If you prefer flexibility in building your setup, the Producer Flex option lets you craft your own multi-camera package. Youâ€™ll collaborate with a PTZOptics partner to pick the exact cameras, cables and software that fit your workflow. That means youâ€™re not limited to predetermined bundles if you have unique production goals.
Setting Up a Three-Camera PTZ Production The idea of a three-camera production might sound like a huge undertaking, but PTZ cameras simplify the process.
First, place your cameras strategically to capture distinct angles â€” a wide shot for establishing context, a medium angle for general coverage and a close-up of a speaker or performer.
Next, store each position as a preset. When youâ€™re in the midst of a live production, you can switch angles or move the camera smoothly with a single command.
Itâ€™s also helpful to incorporate a control surface, like a Stream Deck or other macro tool, to quickly trigger camera presets, automate transitions and shift focus without searching through menus. Many creators integrate these cameras with OBS, vMix or hardware switchers like Blackmagic and Roland. PTZ cameras let you map out multiple actions ahead of time.
Going hands-free with advanced features PTZ cameras arenâ€™t just about remote positioning. Some models can lock onto a presenter and automatically adjust as they move. Meanwhile, NDI integration allows you to send high-quality video signals over standard networks, so you donâ€™t have to rely on bulky, specialized cables.
Maximizing value in post-production Many creators see the value in capturing their livestream footage for editing afterward. With PTZ cameras, you can ISO-record each camera feed separately, which means youâ€™ll have multiple angles saved, even if you didnâ€™t cut to them during the live event. In post-production, you can polish your final product, correct errors and reframe shots as needed. If youâ€™re working with 4K cameras, you can crop in and still maintain excellent clarity, effectively turning one 4K shot into multiple views.
There are also AI-based tools that can enhance your footage. For instance, upscaling or noise reduction solutions, such as Topaz.ai, can help you refine details and increase the resolution. PTZOptics even offers a Preset Pack for Topaz AI to maximize the detail and clarity of PTZ camera footage.
Your Producer Bundle options When itâ€™s time to upgrade your video setup, the right gear can make all the difference. With PTZOptics Producer Bundles, youâ€™ll find an accessible path to professional, multi-camera production â€” no crew needed. If you want a straightforward way to elevate your HD broadcasts, the Producer SE Bundle (1080p) is a solid choice. For those seeking the best possible resolution, the Producer 4K Bundle delivers stunning clarity. And if you need a custom mix of cameras and accessories, Producer Flex puts you in the driverâ€™s seat.
With PTZ cameras doing most of the work, you can focus on delivering a polished, compelling video experience. Itâ€™s never been easier to capture professional-grade video all on your own â€” and thatâ€™s an exciting step forward for creators everywhere.To learn more about your Producer Bundle options, you can go to ptzoptics.com .

author: Alessandra Scotto di Santolo
title: Hamas terrorists accept ceasefire plan in huge step towards peace in Gaza - World News - News - Daily Express US
text: Hamas accepts Gaza ceasefire plan but Israel deems the proposal 'unacceptable' The move marks a critical step towards reducing ongoing violence in the region. Hamas has announced it has accepted a ceasefire proposal for Gaza brokered by Egypt and Qatar which Israel has deemed "unacceptable". An Israeli official said the proposal includes "far-reaching" terms. The [Hamas](https://www.the-express.com/latest/hamas) militant group says it has accepted an Egyptian-Qatari cease-fire proposal to halt the seven-month war with Israel. It issued a statement Monday saying its supreme leader, Ismail Haniyeh, had delivered the news in a phone call with Qatarâ€™s prime minister and Egyptâ€™s intelligence minister. The two Middle Eastern nations have been mediating months of talks between Israel and [Hamas](https://www.the-express.com/latest/hamas). There was no immediate comment from Israel. READ MORE: [Hamas leaders 'quietly deported from Qatar' as Arab nations cut ties with group](/news/world-news/136153/hamas-leaders-deported-qatar-israel-negotiations) The announcement came hours after Israel ordered Palestinians to begin evacuating the southern Gaza town of Rafah ahead of an Israeli military operation. Israel says Rafah is [Hamas](https://www.the-express.com/latest/hamas)â€™ last stronghold. News of [Hamas](https://www.the-express.com/latest/hamas)â€™ announcement sent people in Rafah cheering in the streets. People rushed into the streets in front of Al-Aqsa Hospital in Deir al-Balah in the Gaza Strip, chanting and cheering the news. Details of the proposal were not immediately released. But in recent days, Egyptian and [Hamas](https://www.the-express.com/latest/hamas) officials have said the cease-fire would take place in a series of stages in which [Hamas](https://www.the-express.com/latest/hamas) would release hostages it is holding in exchange for Israeli troop pullbacks from Gaza. It is not clear whether the deal will meet [Hamas](https://www.the-express.com/latest/hamas)â€™ key demand of bringing about an end to the war and complete Israeli withdrawal.
